item.description: 5th Annual Connecticut National Pit Bull Awareness Day!..... Saturday, October 15th, 2011 at the Polish American Club, 194 West Spring Street, West Haven, CT, 11-3pm...... Rain or shine!......... Connecting Pit Bull Advocates, Responsible Owners and Lovers of this Noble Breed!..... Agility, Doggie Games, Guest Speakers, Vendors, Animal Welfare Groups/Shelters, Food 'n Drink, Costume Contests...... Presented by Bikers Against Animal Cruelty, For the Love of the Dog, Friends of New Haven Animal Shelter, Inc., and LoveThyPitBull.com....... The NEBBC hopes to have a booth at this event, but has not confirmed space yet!
item.name: Connecticut National Pit Bull Awareness Day Event!
